original_title: 星奈あい 麻薬捜査官 媚薬漬け膣痙攣
overview: Ai Hoshina, a transfer student, became a hot topic as a mysterious beautiful girl and became the focus of attention during school. But her aim was an undercover investigation to eradicate drug trafficking involving bad school groups. She was Sena who finally held down her transaction scene, but her classmate who was in love with her was caught and became a hostage, and both of them were given medicine.
title: Ai Hoshina The Narcotics Investigation Squad Aphrodisiac Addicted Pussy Spasms
